plot: Ten strangers share a house in Germany constantly watched by dozens of cameras. Every two weeks, they nominate two housemates to be voted out. The last person left in the house wins a cash prize.
plot_en: Ten strangers share a house in Germany constantly watched by dozens of cameras. Every two weeks, they nominate two housemates to be voted out. The last person left in the house wins a cash prize.
plot_es: Ten strangers share a house in Germany constantly watched by dozens of cameras. Every two weeks, they nominate two housemates to be voted out. The last person left in the house wins a cash prize.
title: Big Brother
